name: Rebellion Ages
description:
Rebellions Ages is a casual (yet somewhat hardcore) Tower Defence game, in which the player places a variety of defence posts in order to fight off an impending invasion. With a variety of units on both sides, it's up to you how best to defend yourself!

While it might look simple, only the most strategic players will climb the ranks to those coveted top spots!

Features:

  • Each round consists of a 20-second wave of enemies. How you defend yourself, using the finances and units available to you, is up to you. Devise the best strategy for each level!
  • We'll be adding new units, new upgrades and new enemies as development continues
  • The game contains a Worldwide High Scores system which allows you to compete against the best players for that #1 position!

This is a great little time-killer! Casual on the surface, with a hardcore centre. Get ready to lose yourself!

Have any ideas for improving the game? Get involved! We'd love to hear suggestions on how to improve the game, and make it a more enjoyable experience for everybody!
